title: Shimokitazawa de Rocket Punch
original_name: 下北沢でロケットパンチ
sinopse: The romantic misadventures of two single girls who share an apartment. Yui Suzuki and Mai Oohara are both 23 and looking for love. This volume follows them as they have adventures dating different guys, help a young boy, and eventually find love in unusual places.
